cards.effect: Neither player can target "Lightsworn" monsters (anywhere) with card effects. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
cards.name: Aurkus, Lightsworn Druid

cards.effect: When you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a "Lightsworn" monster: You can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY, then target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy those targets.
cards.name: Celestia, Lightsworn Angel

cards.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish that target.
cards.name: D.D. Crow

cards.effect: Discard 1 "Lightsworn" monster; draw 2 cards, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY.
cards.name: Solar Recharge

cards.effect: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target up to 2 monsters in their GY; banish those targets. Your opponent cannot banish cards from either GY.
cards.name: Kycoo the Ghost Destroyer
